original: tribhāgaikantu vistāraṃ pātraṃ kāmsye na kārayet || 13-6 ||
analyzed: tri bhāga ekam tu vistāram pātram na kārayet  /
tasya abjasya uccam dvi aṅgulyam eka aṅgulam atha api vā
kartavyam karṇikā bāhye dala aṣṭakam atha ardhataḥ
utsedha arddham tad arddham syāt dalāgrantu nava unnatam
pātram vṛttam prakartavyam madhyame viṃśat aṅgulam
adhame ṣoḍaśa aṅgulyam pātra vistāram ucyate

original: evaṃ kṛtvā baleḥ pātraṃ maṇḍale vinyaset sudhīḥ || 13-9 ||
analyzed: evam kṛtvā baleḥ pātram maṇḍale vinyaset sudhīḥ
tatas tri kālam annena baliḥ liṅgasya ca uttamam
prātar madhyāhnam annena madhyam tu viduḥ budhāḥ
madhyāhne ca anna liṅgantu gajānana

original: pūrvāhṇe puṣpaliṅgantu sā ye taṇḍulameva ca || 13-11 ||
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe puṣpa liṅgam tu sā ye taṇḍulam eva ca
uttamasya āḍhakam ca syāt madhyamasya tad ardhakam
adhamam taṇḍulam pācayet kramāt
apakvam ati pakvam ca ati uṣṇam ati śītalam
varjayet deśika uttamaḥ
dadhi sarpi phalaiḥ miśram marditam yathā
ṣoḍaśa aṅgulam utsedham tham mūlam tad viguṇam bhavet
ūrdhvam tri aṅgula nnāham ānupūrvāt kṣayam bhavet
madhyamam dvādaśa aṅgulyam ūrdhvam kuryāt dvaya aṅgulam
aṣṭa aṅgula adhamam proktam ūrdhvam eka aṅgulam bhavet
astram pāśupatat nyastvā rūpam tatra vicintayet
trinetram catur bhujam raudram śikhā koṭi samujvalam
vara da abhaya dam hastam vāmam savya akṣa śūla dhṛt
evam pāśupatam dhyātvā bali liṃgesu pūjayet
darśayet astra mudrām tu śāstra mudrām tu deśikaḥ
namaskāra abja mudre ca darśayet tu viśeṣataḥ
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya tad rūpam pratimām budhaḥ
purastāt pratimā aṅga cheda anna ādikam anu vrajet
daśa āyudhāni paritas sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
vidhi snānam purā kṛtvā puryaṣṭi paricārakāḥ
śukla uṣṇī ṣa uttarīyaḥ ca śukla mālya anulepanaḥ
pavitra pāṇiḥ maunī ca hasta mātreṇa daṇḍa dhṛt
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktaḥ sarva avayava sundaraḥ
śirasā ādhārayet liṅgam pradakṣiṇa viśeṣataḥ
pūrvāhṇe brahmaṇaḥ prītiḥ bhavet bali vidhānataḥ
rakta uṣṇī ṣa uttarīyaḥ ca śukla mālya anulepanaḥ
madhyāhne dhārayet nityam mama prīti karam bhavet
pīta uṣṇī ṣa uttarīyaḥ ca viṣṇu prītiḥ tu sāyake
dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ śiṣyam saṃprokṣya hṛdayena tu
gandham puṣpam tathā da tvā pātram śirasi vinyaset
raṃgā iva a śibikāyām vā gaja ārūḍham atha api vā
athavā pāda gamanam pradakṣiṇam atha ācaret
paṭahaiḥ maddalaiḥ ca eva jhallarī jaya ghaṇṭakaiḥ
kāhalaiḥ tālakaiḥ śaṅkhaiḥ vīṇā veṇu ravaiḥ saha
chatra dhvaja samāyukta piñcha cāmara saṃyutam
dhūpa dīpa samāyuktam vitāna upari śobhitam
nṛtta gīta samopetam gaṇikābhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
anyaiḥ bhakta janaiḥ sārdham stotra dhvani samanvitam

original: pūrve tu samahastaṃ syāt bhṛṃgiṇī patataṃ param || 13-30 ||
analyzed: pūrve tu sama hastam syāt bhṛṃgiṇī patatam param
tṛtīyam kadruvā ādyam ca caturtham tu ca ḍhakkakam

pīṭha ekam āvṛtya prāsāda agra pradakṣiṇam
indrasya śubhra tālantu bhavet
vā araṇyāt nava tālam tu vāyoḥ vaināga tālakam

original: somasya kollikā proktā īśānasya tu ḍhakkarī || 13-34 ||
analyzed: somasya kollikā proktā īśānasya tu ḍhakkarī
iti etaiḥ kalpitāḥ tālaiḥ prāsādam tris pradakṣiṇam
kṛtvā pādau su saṃkṣālya pādukā arcanam ārabhet
pādyaiḥ ācamanaiḥ arghyaiḥ gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ su dhūpakaiḥ
baliñca prathamañca eva pūjayet tu viśeṣataḥ
tatas paścāt vinyasya pūrva maṇḍale
gandha puṣpa ādinā abhyarcya hṛdayena tu mantra vid
prāc uktena astamantreṇa śiva saṃyojayet sudhīḥ
saṃpūjya devadeveśam namaskāra ākhya mudrayā
savya apasavya mārgeṇa tris kṛtvā tu pradakṣiṇam
daṇḍa vat praṇamet vā atha daṇḍa ākhyam iti ca smṛtam
daṇḍa ākhyaḥ śrūyate paścāt aṣṭāṅgam san niyojayet

original: śirojānū ca karṇau ca cibukaṃ bāhukadvayam || 13-40 ||
analyzed: śiraḥ jānū ca karṇau ca cibukam bāhuka dvayam

original: śirohastau dvijānū ca kṛtvā pañcabhuvi sthitam || 13-41 ||
analyzed: śiraḥ hastau dvi jānū ca kṛtvā pañca bhuvi sthitam
idam pañcāṅgam eva tu namaskāra trayam smṛtam
adhamam hi etat ākhyātam yathā
tatas upahāra puṣpāṇi caṇḍeśāyani vedayet
anna liṅgam jale vā api bāhya pīṭhe vinikṣipet
tad ante kārayet nṛntam tad ukta vidhinā asaha
tat upāṅgam iti proktam arcana ante tu nityaśas
citra alaṅkāra saṃyukte maṇḍape samalaṃkṛte
bherī ādīn tu tathā yāntī śiva saṃsthitān
narttakaḥ mardakaḥ ca eva dakṣiṇe tu vyavasthitau
uttare viniveśitam

original: ācāryau dakṣiṇe deśe saumye tasyādhipa smṛtam |
analyzed: ācāryau dakṣiṇe deśe saumye tasya adhipa smṛtam
su snātvā samyak ācamya gandha dravya ādi pūrvakam
śukla vastra paridhānāḥ śukla mālya upaśobhitā
sarva ābharaṇa saṃpūrṇā nṛtta geya su peśalā
pūrvā sandhyāḥ tu gāndhāram ṣāḍapañca tatas param

original: madhyāhne naṭṭarāgaṃ syāt kauśikañca tataḥ param || 13-49 ||
analyzed: madhyāhne naṭṭarāgam syāt kauśikam ca tatas param

original: sāye tu cedakaṃ proktamardharātre tu pañcamam |
analyzed: sāye tu cedakam proktam ardharātre tu pañcamam

original: evaṃ nṛttaṃ kṛtaṃ yatra subhikṣaṃ lokaśāntikam |
analyzed: evam nṛttam kṛtam yatra subhikṣam loka śāntikam
durnimittāni naśyanti kṣetram ārodhakam nṛṇām
kakāra adhi patiḥ ca api bhoga mokṣa prādāyakam
kavāṭa bandhanam kṛtvā sva gṛham sanniveśayet
evam nitya utsavam proktam utsavam ca tatas śṛṇu
iti nityotsavavidhi paṭalaḥ trayodaśaḥ
atha śivotsavavidhi paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi śiva utsava vidhim śṛṇu
nava aham uttamam proktam sapta aham madhyamam smṛtam
pañca aham adhamam proktam utsavam trividham smṛtam
alābhe tu prakartavyau traya ha ekāhakau tathā
ādyeṣu ca tritīyeṣu dhvaja ārohaṇam ārabhet

original: na dhvajārohaṇaṃ proktaṃ dvitaye tu tathotsave || 14-3 ||
analyzed: na dhvaja ārohaṇam proktam dvitaye tu tathā utsave
tat dinam triguṇi kṛtya tad ādau dhvajam uddharet
dviguṇe tad dina ādau vā dhvajam āropya buddhimān
dhvaja ārohaṇa pūrvam vā bherī tāḍana pūrvakam
triguṇe dviguṇe kāle kārayet deśika uttamaḥ
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrve tu ādirātri aṅkura arpaṇam
kṛtvā bherīn tu santāḍya dhvajam āropayet tatas
utsave ca sāya ādi dinam uttamam
prātar kāle hi avabhṛtham sāyaṅkāle samārabhet  /
rātriḥ sāyāhni vā prātar iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
nava ahe iṣṭādaśa balim sapta ahe tu caturdaśa  /

original: evaṃ kṛte tu matimān lokaśāntikaraṃ bhavet || 14-9 ||
analyzed: evam kṛte tu matimān loka śānti karam bhavet

puṣya antam pauṣya māse tu magha antam māgha māsake

original: viśākhāntaṃ hi vaiśākhe jyeṣṭhe mūlāntakaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: viśākha antam hi vaiśākhe jyeṣṭhe mūla antakam bhavet
uttarāṣāḍham āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe śravaṇa antakam  /
pūrvābhādre tathā māse pūrvābhādra antam ucyate
āśvantam aśvayuj māse utsavam kārayet budhaḥ
ārdrā antam sarva māseṣu kartavyantu śiva utsavam
ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī ihi amāvāsyā ante vā anyat puṇye ṛkṣake

original: madhye vṛṣabhamālikhya sthitaṃ vā śayanantu vā |
analyzed: madhye vṛṣabham ālikhya sthitam vā vā

devadārukam
nālikera tarum vā api nirṇitam su dṛḍha dhvajam

original: prāsāda triguṇaṃ dairghyaṃ dviguṇaṃ vā tataḥ samam |
analyzed: prāsāda triguṇam dairghyam dviguṇam vā tatas samam
śikhara grīva sīmāntam vṛṣabhasthala saṃmatam

ṣaṭtriṃśat aṃgula nnāham dhvaja daṇḍam vidhīyate

tat ghanan catur aṅgulyam tribhiḥ aṅgulibhiḥ tu vā
dvādaśa aṅgulyam ṣoḍaśa aṅgulyakam tu vā

original: daṇḍe tu suṣiraṃ kṛtvā susnigdhantu yathā tathā || 14-23 ||
analyzed: daṇḍe tu suṣiram kṛtvā su snigdham tu yathā tathā

athavā ṣoḍaśa antālam caturdaśa antālam eva vā
vā grāhyam
tasya ardha ardhaḥ ca mātre tu valayantu āyasena tu
yantra artham bandhayet dhīmān alābhe dāruṇā bhavet

tantunā su dṛḍham kṛtam

kalayet madhya hārāyām madhya ādeḥ madhyame api vā
bhūmim khātvā ūru mātram tu haiman tatra eva nikṣipet

darpaṇa udara saṃkāśam dhvajapīṭham vidhīyate

uttama uttama pīṭhasya

dhvajam āropayet tatra rajjuyantreṇa buddhimān

sarva deva mayam śūlam sthaṇḍila upari vinyaset
madhya patre bhavet rudraḥ

paṭaham viṣṇu daivatyam suṣiram vāyu daivatam

vāsukī
mātaraḥ sapta kīlāḥ tu prahāra āskanda daivatam

original: utsavāraṃbha pūrve tu rathādīn kārayet kramāt |
analyzed: utsava āraṃbha pūrve tu ratha ādīn kārayet kramāt

original: p. 69) uttare vātha kartavyamaiśānnyāṃ pāvake tathā |

original: vajrāṅkuśaṃ triśūlañca cakraṃ tatra tathaiva ca || 14-62 ||

hema yuktam prakalpayet
dhyātvā sadāśivam devam śiva kumbhe niveśayet

original: vāme saṃsthāpya cakrantu dakṣiṇe padmameva ca |

vṛṣa yāgam tatas kṛtvā nava sapta aha pañca vā
traya aha eka ahnam eva atha utsavam vidhi coditam
pradakṣiṇe vṛṣaṃpūrvam kuryāt anyāni tad samam
vṛṣa yāgam idam khyātam vahneḥ saṃsthāpanam śṛṇu
iti vṛṣabhasthāpanavidhi paṭala catvāriṃśattamaḥ
atha vahni sthāpana vidhi paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi vahneḥ saṃsthāpanam śṛṇu
parivāre api atha āgneyyām vimāne pūrvavat kṛte
tatra beram tu kartavyam pūrva uktena pramāṇataḥ
hasta mānena vā ca ardha kareṇa eva tu pīṭhakam
tri mekhalam bhavet pīṭham padma pīṭham atha api vā
pīṭha stham vā athaberam vā pratiṣṭhām samyak ācaret
yat te na ādya svara upetam prathamam bījam iṣyate
repheṇa ekādaśa upetam dvitīyam syāt ca vahninā
śikhānām dvādaśa antam yat svara yut tat caturthakam
jīvānta bījam uddhṛtya kāle vahni samāyutam
tena eva nīla māyābhyām vahneḥ piṇḍantu paścime
maulinā bhūṣitāḥ sarve bhukti mukti phala pradam
vacmi iha vahni rūpam tu rakta varṇan catur bhujam
varada abhaya hastam ca
śaktiḥ syāt aparevāme dakṣiṇe tu sṛcandharam  /
eka ānanam tri netram ca raktakośā ūrdhvam eva ca
vahni rūpam samākhyātam evam dhāmani vinyaset
yajane ca agni madhye ca pūrva uktena svarūpataḥ

dhāma agra maṇḍape ramye madhye vedi samanvitam
prāc uktena krameṇa eva pañca agnim saṃprakalpayet

loham ced ratna vinyāsam kṛtvā nayana mokṣaṇam

pauṛṣa ādi purāṇa antam phala vṛddhi uttarottaram

original: tasmat paurāṇike sthāne kārayet tatra vittamaḥ |
analyzed: tasmat paurāṇike sthāne kārayet tatra vittamaḥ
daivike madhyamam jñeyam anyatra eva adhamam smṛtam
prāsādasya aiśa diś bhāge pūrve vā vā
paścime antarāle manorame
caturaśra maṇḍapam kṛtvā catur dvāra samāyutam
daśa dvādaśa hastam vā ṣoḍaśa staṃbha saṃyutam
catur toraṇa saṃyuktam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
darbha mālābhiḥ āveṣṭya muktā sragdāma śobhitam
tad madhye vedikām kuryāt nava bhāga eka vistṛtam
utsedhaḥ caru mātreṇa darpaṇa udara vat śubham
kuṇḍāni pūrva ukta vidhinā a saha
athavā caturaśrāṇi vṛttāni vidiśāsu vai
cakra śaṃkarayoḥ madhye vṛta kuṇḍam prakalpayet

original: agniṃ vai pūrvavaddhutvā vidyāṅgaṃ hṛdayena tu || 8-11 ||
analyzed: agnim vai pūrvavat hutvā vidyā aṅgam hṛdayena tu
sthaṇḍilam vedikā āyāntu śālibhiḥ vimalaiḥ tathā
tatra eva saṃlikhet padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇakam
gandha puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya dhūpa dīpaiḥ viśeṣataḥ
hiraṇya bhājanasya adhaspaṭa patram spṛṣṭa patram sa kaṇikam
ūrdhva bhāgam tatas kṛtvā catur dvāra samanvitam
nyaset maṃtrī bīja mukhyena mantrataḥ
prakṣālya pañcagavyena samabhyarcya sadā budhaḥ
jala snānam purā kṛtvā danta dhāvana pūrvakam
bhasma snānam tatas kṛtvā śukla candana lepitaḥ
śukla vastra upavītaḥ ca śukla mālyeḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ
sa uṣṇīṣaḥ ca uttarīyaḥ ca sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
praviśet bhājanasya antam pūrva abhimukha saṃsthitaḥ
śiva mantram japitvā tu śiva dhyāna parāyaṇaḥ
ūrdhva bhāgena sañchādya hṛdayena vicakṣaṇaḥ
sūtraiḥ āveṣṭya yatnena puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtaḥ
śivaḥ ham iti saṃbhāvya yāvat
tasmāt nirgamya nṛpatiḥ namaskṛtvā sadāśivam

original: hiraṇyagarbhaveśāt tu punarjanma na tu vṛjet || 8-20 ||
analyzed: hiraṇyagarbha veśāt tu punarjanma na tu vṛjet  /
bhūtvā hiraṇya garbheṇa vidhātā sarva jantuṣu

original: praṇipatya guruṃ tatra saṃpūjya ca viśeṣataḥ || 8-21 ||
analyzed: praṇipatya gurum tatra saṃpūjya ca viśeṣataḥ
hotrān saṃpūjya vidhivat vastra hema aṅgulīyakaiḥ
sarva yajña phalam prāpya sarva dāna phalam labhet
dikṣitānām nṛpāṇām tu kartavyam tat prayatnataḥ
śaiva mārga sthitānām tu grahiṇām liṃginām api
bhaktānām dāpayet tatra nṛpa sauvarṇa bhājanam
proktam tulā bhāram tatas śṛṇu
pūrva ukta sthāna kāleṣu kartavyam tat nṛpeṇa tu
khadiraḥ candanam ca evaḥ tālam caṃpaka vilvakaiḥ
anyaiḥ tu sāra vṛkṣaiḥ vā kṛtvā astam bha dvayam tatas
tad ūrdhve ca uttara nyastvā daṇḍa madhye tu yojayet
sapta ṣaṣ pañca hastam vā nāham dvātriṃśat aṃgulam
agrayoḥ suṣiram kṛtvā badhvā śṛṃkhalayā dṛḍham
sama vṛtam tri hastam tu tāmra pātra dvayam tathā
kiñcid suṣiram tayoḥ badhvā tu rajjubhiḥ

original: āyasena tu madhye tu susnigdhaṃ kārayet budhaḥ |
analyzed: āyasena tu madhye tu su snigdham kārayet budhaḥ
darbha mālābhiḥ āveṣṭya puṣpa mālā upaśobhitam
staṃbham vastraiḥ tu saṃveṣṭyaḥ sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
tulām āropya nṛpatiḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
tulā manu samāyuktam hṛdayena vicakṣaṇaḥ
śeṣa pātre tu saṃyojya hema tad tulya gartakaḥ
śiva mantran japitvā tu śiva dhyāna parāyaṇaḥ
avatīrya tulāyāḥ tu tat suvarṇam tu pūrvavat
daivānām ca eva śaivānām brāhmaṇānām guroḥ tathā
ādiśaiva anuśaivānām dāpayet tu yathārhakam
vā japeya sahasraiḥ tu rājasūya śataiḥ api
aśvamedha sahasraiḥ tu taiḥ tulyam phalam āpnuyāt
proktam vai dahanam śṛṇu
iti hiraṇyagarbha tulā bhāra vidhi paṭala uṣṭamaḥ
atha dahanavidhi paṭalaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi dahanasya vidhi kramam
yadā caitanya rahite prārabhet dahana kriyām
dahanam ca kṛtim bhadran ca avaṭa agnikam eva ca
avaṭa ādi kriyāḥ sarvāḥ saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu suvṛta
garbhasrāvam ca patanam uḍhagarbham tathā prajāḥ
caula kāryāt ayaḥ martyāḥ ye mṛtāḥ ca avaṭa abhikāḥ
dahanam hali karma ādi varjyante eṣām prayatnataḥ
pavana ūrdhva mṛtiḥ yeṣām abdam pratidine dine
bali dāha ādya karmāṇi samam etat udāhṛtam
daśa varṣāt atikrānte daśa aham dāpayet balim
avaṭa agnika kāryam tu samāsāt procyate idhunā
kṛtvā śarīra śuddhim tat rajanī puṣpa śobhitam
darbhaiḥ āveṣṭya yatnena bandhubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
kārpāsa vāsasā vā api grāhayet tu vicakṣaṇaḥ
śiva bhaktiḥ śuciḥ bhūtvā bhasma uddhūlita vigrahaḥ
apasavya upavītaḥ tu kṛta darbha uttarīyakaḥ
gatvā śmaśāna deśe tu śuddha deśe manohare
khātvā urvīm tad pramāṇena vistāram tad pramāṇataḥ
bāhu mātra bhide nimne nyastvā darbha akṣata ādibhiḥ
śiraḥ tu dakṣiṇe deśe śāyayet mṛtakam tathā
tūṣṇīm gandha ādinā abhyarcya darbhaiḥ ācchādya tad chavam
mṛdam saṃpūrya tatra eva su snigdhantu suvarṇakaiḥ

original: tadā snānañca kartavyaṃ tatsapiṇḍaiḥ sahaiva tu |
analyzed: tadā snānam ca kartavyam tad sapiṇḍaiḥ saha eva tu
dāha kriyā vinā yatra bali karma na kārayet
avaṭāgnikam eva uktam ākṛtiñca tatas śṛṇu
vācā yuktasya amaraṇam śastreṇa eva tu muṣṭikā
vasūri kṣaya kuṣṭha ādyaiḥ ātma ghātaka māraṇam
jalena śriṃgiṇau api vahninā vā viśeṣataḥ
etaiḥ tu maraṇam eṣām teṣām ākṛtiḥ ucyate
sarpeṇa paśunā a nāgaiḥ deśāt deśa antare gate
dvādaśa abdāt ati krānte ā kṛtiḥ dahanam smṛtam

original: tasya patnyasti cettatra vaidhavyaṃ kārayet kramāt || 9-16 ||
analyzed: tasya patnī asti ced tatra vaidhavyam kārayet kramāt
bali karmāṇi ca anyāni kṛtvā ca eva sa mantrakam

original: paścāt kṛte gate vāpi maṅgalyābharaṇaṃ tathā || 9-17 ||
analyzed: paścāt kṛte gate vā api maṅgalya ābharaṇam tathā
maṅgalyam uttarīyeṇa patnyā ā kaṇṭhe tu ropayet
ācāryam pūjayet himāni avadāḥ maraṇa antikam

original: yatra pūrvakriyāsūtyā tatra karma na kārayet |
analyzed: yatra pūrva kriyā sūtyā tatra karma na kārayet
śastra ādi maraṇam yatra kāryam saṃvatsara upari
amantreṇa dahet deham khanitvā ca atha bhū tale
sudarbhaiḥ ākṛtim kṛtvā sūtraiḥ āveṣṭya ca ā kṛtim
palāśa patraiḥ āveṣṭya sarva aṅgam parikalpya vai
mṛta vat sarva karmāṇi kārayet tu vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: p. 281) ākṛterdahanaṃ proktā dahanasya vidhiṃ śṛṇu |
analyzed: ākṛteḥ dahanam proktā dahanasya vidhim śṛṇu
śava śuddhim purā kṛtvā bhasma snānam atas param
sikate sthaṇḍilaṅkṛtvā sva pramāṇena deśikaḥ
darbhaiḥ upari vinyasya pretam tatra upavinyaset
badhvā pādau ca hastau ca raṅga mālyaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
dhyātvā śiva tanum pūrvam brahma aṅga ākṛti vigrahaḥ
karṇamantraṃjapam kṛtvā bījamukhyantu mantrataḥ
snātvā camya vidhānena vāme tad upavītakam
sapiṇḍaiḥ bāndhavaiḥ vā api saṃsnāyī evam śiva agnikam
caturaśram alaṅkṛtvā khanitvā kīlaka trayam
teṣām ūrdhve tathā pātram nyastvā adha suṣakam budhaḥ
tasya adhas ca agnim uddīpya tu ṣaka agnau yathāvidhi
śiva agnim dhyāyayet tatra gandha ādyaiḥ ca agni pūjanam
nidhāya śuddha deśe tu kṛtvā āśvāsa parīkṣaṇam
hṛd nāsi karṇa deśeṣu sparśayitvā kramāt budhaḥ
hṛdayena tu mantreṇa śvāsam saṃśodhya mantra vid
aghoreṇa tat uthāpya śaśāne ca uparopyate

original: yāvat pretasya cāyāmaṃ tāvat bhūmintu khātayet || 9-30 ||
analyzed: yāvat pretasya ca āyāmam tāvat bhūmin tu khātayet
arati mātram ardham vā tila akṣata kuśa udakaiḥ
vāmadevena saṃprokṣya snātvā ā koṇeṣu kīlakān
sūtraiḥ āveṣṭya paritas kāṣṭham tatra eva nikṣipet

original: pretasya dakṣiṇe bhāge śivāgniṃ pūrvavat budhaḥ || 9-32 ||
analyzed: pretasya dakṣiṇe bhāge śiva agnim pūrvavat budhaḥ

original: hṛdayena śataṃ hutvā tannāmnā tu śatāhutiḥ |
analyzed: hṛdayena śatam hutvā tad nāmnā tu śata āhutiḥ
homa śeṣam ghṛte na eva caru kṣīra akṣata ādibhiḥ
nābhi hṛd vaktra deśeṣu hṛdayena vinikṣipet
indhana upari vinyasya dakṣiṇe tu śiraḥ tatas
nava dvāreṣu buddhimān
tadā asya cakṣuṣī karṇau na asi dvārau
liṅgam ca iti nava dvāram hṛdayena nidhāpayet
kṣīra taṇḍula sammiśram da tvā vāmena ca āsyake
chedayitvā tatas pāśam aghora astreṇa mantra vid
sraj vāsam ca tatas kuryāt sapiṇḍaiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ tathā
pradakṣiṇa trayam kṛtvā velā agreṇa eva buddhimān
jala dhārā samāyuktam nava mṛd ghaṭam
pradakṣiṇa vaśā dvāram astramantreṇa deśikaḥ
pradakṣiṇa trayam kṛtvā vāma pārśve nidhāya vai
tatas kapāla toyaiḥ ca prāṇa sthāneṣu yojayet
mūrdha ādi pāda paryantam mājya ālepam su śobhitam
pāda dvayam ca saṃspṛśya smṛtvā āgau tu haviṣya vat
aghoreṇa agni nikṣipya śira sthāne śivam smaret  /

original: nadyāṃ vāpi taṭāke vā susnātvā bhārakaiḥ saha |
analyzed: nadyām vā api taṭāke vā su snātvā bhārakaiḥ saha
pañcagavyam ghṛtam pītvā mūlamantram śatam japet  /
yathā śaktyā adhanam da tvā brāhmaṇānām daridriṇām

original: tīrtthaṃ gatvā yathā nyāyaṃ snāpayitvā sapiṇḍakaiḥ || 9-43 ||
analyzed: tīrttham gatvā yathā nyāyam snāpayitvā sapiṇḍakaiḥ
tila udakam tu tātavyam tasya tad nāma pūrvakam
dahanasya vidhiḥ proktā brahmacarya ādiṣu kramāt
dahanam tu na kurvīta
saṃvāhya śibikā ādyeṣu tūrya śabdaiḥ mahā ravaiḥ
sarva maṅgala karmāṇi kārayet tu vicakṣaṇaḥ
khātvā daṇḍa pramāṇena prāc mukham tatra pūrvavat

original: snānaṃ tatra na kurvīta nāstye vā śaucaṃ maṃtriṇaḥ |
analyzed: snānam tatra na kurvīta vā śaucam maṃtriṇaḥ
bali karmaṇi kartavyam ekoddiṣṭa adhikam vinā
samāsāt dahanam proktam pitṛ yajña vidhim śṛṇu
iti dahanavidhi paṭalaḥ navamaḥ
atha pitṛyajña vidhi paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi pitṛ yajña vidhi kramam
dahana ante baliṅkṛtvā ekoddiṣṭam tad antike
āśramāṇām trayāṇām ca bali piṇḍa udaka kriyā
kartavyam dvāra vāme tu nyastvā ca ātma śarāvakam
kūrcam aśma madhye vinikṣipet
pitṛ daivatam āvāhya gandha puṣpa ādinā arcayet  /

original: tasya tat gotranāmnā tu sarvadravyaṃ hṛdābudhaḥ |
analyzed: tasya tat gotra nāmnā tu sarva dravyam hṛdā budhaḥ
prathamehni ca anyeṣu evantu dāpayet  /
tasya prīti karam dravyam dāpayitvā prayatnataḥ

original: pitṛpūjā yadā kuryāt tasya tuṣṭipradaṃ sadā || 10-5 ||
analyzed: pitṛ pūjāḥ yadā kuryāt tasya tuṣṭi pradam sadā
dvitīyehani tantra ātmā dāhakena samanvitaḥ

original: sapiṇḍaiḥ sahagatvā tu śmaśāne cāgnike punaḥ || 10-6 ||
analyzed: sapiṇḍaiḥ saha gatvā tu śmaśāne ca agnike punar
ghṛta kṣura samāyuktam śeṣa aṅgam dahanan caret
sapta ahe nava bhāṇḍam tu asthi saṃgrahaṇam tathā
saktu lāja udanā pūpaiḥ catur dikṣu ca dāpayet
aṅgaiḥ aṅga ādi kandhārya tad mantreṇa eva nikṣipet

original: puṇyanāmā tu matimān śubhārthāya ca dehinām |
analyzed: puṇyanāmā tu matimān śubha arthāya ca dehinām
nava ahe vā parāhṇe tu śarāva aśma su pūrvavat
daśa rātram ati kramya sarva antasthān visarjayet

original: sthāpayitvā jalān sarvān gomayena tu lipya vai || 10-10 ||
analyzed: sthāpayitvā jalān sarvān gomayena tu lipya vai
puṇyāham tatra kurvīta tat aśeṣatas
ekādaśa ahe kartavyam ekoddiṣṭam visarjayet
kṛti kālam atha ārabhya subhakṣa apekṣakam vinā

original: grahe vā purato vāpi prapāṃ vai kārayet budhaḥ || 10-12 ||
analyzed: grahe vā puratas vā api prapām vai kārayet budhaḥ
caturaśre sarva alaṅkāra saṃyute
śaiva tantra vidaḥ sarvān tasya madhye samāvahet  /

original: p. 284) pādyācamanārghyaṃ datvā nama smṛtvā tu cāgrataḥ |
analyzed: pādya ācamana arghyam da tvā smṛtvā tu ca agratas
mama idam sarva śāstra artham astu vai
anugrahṇam tu iti brūyāt āvartā ekā vaṭa dvayam
śrāddha karma samārabhya dakṣiṇe tad pada arthinaḥ
padārthinaḥ nimittam ca viśvedeva puraskṛtān
śaiva ācāra vṛtān ca eva śrotriyān priya darśinaḥ

original: saṃgrāhyaitān namaskṛtvā pādau śaucaṃ tataḥ kuru |
analyzed: saṃgrāhya etān namaskṛtvā pādau śaucam tatas kuru
kārayet ca dvayam pūrva antayoḥ darbhān paristaret
prakṣipya atha tilam madhye tailena abhyañjanam tatas
sarvān abhyañjanam kṛtvā snānam sarvān samācaret  /
deva agni pitṛ yajña artham sthaṇḍilam trayam atra vai
uttare devadeveśam madhyame ignīm prakalpayet
dakṣiṇe pitṛ piṇḍam ca śūrpa ākāram tu deśikaḥ
kārayet vyajanam bhaktyā śivasya vidhi pūrvakam
medhya ignim vidhivat hutvā dakṣiṇāgnim parisaret
tadvat paridhayaḥ tatra samidh ājya odanaiḥ tilaiḥ
huta ayanāḥ ma mūlena śata āhutiḥ
sahasra akṣara mantreṇa homam kṛtvā tu śaktitaḥ

original: aghoreṇa śataṃ hutvā svanāmnā tu śatāhutiḥ |
analyzed: aghoreṇa śatam hutvā sva nāmnā tu śata āhutiḥ
nimittam ca trayam bhojyam viśvau devau prapūjayet
gandha ādyaiḥ ca samabhyarcya vardhanīm ca sa taṇḍulām

original: vastraṃ kāṃsaṃ suvarṇañca śayanaṃ pādukaṃ tathā || 10-24 ||
analyzed: vastram kāṃsam suvarṇam ca śayanam pādukam tathā
dakṣiṇān ca yathā śaktyā dāpayet bhakti saṃyutaḥ
tāṃbūlam tu viśeṣeṇa da tvā ca
darbha agraiḥ su samudvāsya paścāt piṇḍam tu deśikaḥ
śūrpe sā udana dadyācyaiḥ mardayet sā padaṃśakaiḥ
kadalī puṣpa vat piṇḍam dakṣiṇa agram viśeṣataḥ
svāhā antam praṇava antam vā mantram etat udāhṛtam

original: p. 285) caturthyantaṃ hite madhye tasya nāmasamanvitam |
analyzed: caturthī antam hite madhye tasya nāma samanvitam
gandha puṣpam ca dhūpa dīpam viśeṣataḥ
tilam tilam tāṃbūlam api pārśvakāḥ
dhyātvā parama satbhāvam śivam tatvā eka tām budhaḥ
pātre piṇḍam samutthāpya tatas haṃsat niyojayet
śaivān saṃbhojya yatnena piṇḍam rātrau jale kṣipet
pitra yajña vidhiḥ proktaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇam śṛṇu
iti pitṛyajña vidhi paṭalaḥ daśamaḥ
atha sapiṇḍīkaraṇa vidhi paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam param

original: dvādaśāhe trimāse vā ṣāṇmāse vatsare'pi vā || 11-1 ||
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tri māse vā ṣāṇmāse vatsare pi vā
taila abhyañjanaka ādīni pūrvavat parikalpayet
deveśam uddharet madhye vahni śūrpam tu dakṣiṇe
saṃpūjya pūrvavat sarvam nimittam bhojayet tatas
tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca
teṣu evam sarva tatvāni kalpayitvā viśeṣataḥ
pārtthiva ādiṣu pañca eva pañca piṇḍam tu vinyaset
tasmāt upari sāda ākhyam pūjayet tu sadāśivam
liṅgam kṛtvā viśeṣeṇa dvādaśa aṅgula dīrghikam
arcana ukta vidhānena tasmin saṃpūjayet śivam

original: tatpiṇḍaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā tatvetatve tu yojayet || 11-6 ||
analyzed: tat piṇḍam pūrvavat kṛtvā tatva etatve tu yojayet  /
pūrvam saṃyojya sālokyam sāmīpyam ca dvitīyakam
tritīyam ca eva sārūpyam sā yujyantu caturthakam

original: p. 286) evaṃ dhyātvā tu yat samyak sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: evam dhyātvā tu yat samyak sapiṇḍīkaraṇam bhavet
aṣṭakā homa kāryam tu saṃkṣepam śṛṇu suvṛta

original: māghe ca proṣṭhamāse ca sarvedvau tu viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: māghe ca proṣṭha māse ca tu viśeṣataḥ

original: sūrye ca sūryaputre ca bhūmiputre tathaiva ca || 11-9 ||
analyzed: sūrye ca sūryaputre ca bhūmiputre tathā eva ca

original: aṣṭakā kurute vidvānasya dvāre tu vāyadi |
analyzed: aṣṭakā kurute vidvānasya dvāre tu vāyadi
śiva agnim pūrvavat hutvā pañca brahmaiḥ śatam hunet
pañca ṣaṣ saṅkhyakān śaivān bhojayitvā viśeṣataḥ
